resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82149</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82149</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Beat the Burglar</string>
            <string language="es">Coger al ladrón</string>
            <string language="ga">Sáraigh an Buirgléir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlagen Sie den Einbrecher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Battez le cambrioleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bata o assaltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Batti lo scassinatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κτυπήστε το διαρρήκτη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson involving an investigation to identify, from the clues provided, who committed a "burglary". The class group will have to organize itself to work out the answer, and the aim is to provide the students with insights about how they work as a group.</string>
            <string language="es">Lección que incluye una investigación para identificar, a partir de las pistas dadas, quien cometió un “robo”. El grupo de la clase tendrá que organizarse para averiguar la respuesta, y el objetivo es que los estudiantes vean como trabajan como grupo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht ina bhfuil fiosrúchán chun an daoine ciontach a aimsiú ó na leideanna a tugadh. Beidh ar an ngrúpa ranga iad féin a eagrú chun an fhreagra a oibriu amach, agus is í an aidhm léargais a thabhairt do na daltaí ar an gcaoi a n-oibríonn siad mar ghrúpa</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion, die eine Untersuchung mit einbezieht, 
um, von den Anhaltspunkten zu kennzeichnen bereitgestellt, die einen 
"Burglary" festlegten. Die Kategorie Gruppe muß sich 
organisieren, um die Antwort auszuarbeiten, und das Ziel ist, zu 
versehen die Kursteilnehmer mit Einblicken über, wie sie als Gruppe 
arbeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon comportant une recherche pour identifier, 
des indices fournis, qui ont commis un "cambriolage". Le groupe 
de classe devra s'organiser pour établir la réponse, et le but est 
de fournir aux étudiants des perspicacités au sujet de la façon 
dont ils travaillent en tant que groupe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição que envolve uma investigação para 
identificar, dos indícios fornecidos, que cometeram um "burglary". 
O grupo da classe terá que organizar-se para trabalhar para 
fora da resposta, e o alvo é fornecer os estudantes com as 
introspecções sobre como trabalham como um grupo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione che coinvolge una ricerca per 
identificare, dagli indizii forniti, che hanno commesso "un burglary".
Il gruppo del codice categoria dovrà organizzarsi per risolvere
la risposta e lo scopo è fornire agli allievi le comprensioni circa 
come lavorano come gruppo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα που περιλαμβάνει μια έρευνα που προσδιορίζει, 
από τις ενδείξεις παρεχόμενες, οι οποίες εδιάπραξαν μια 
"διάρρηξη". Η ομάδα κλάσης θα πρέπει να οργανωθεί για να 
επιλύσει την απάντηση, και ο στόχος είναι να παρασχεθούν οι 
σπουδαστές τις ιδέες για το πώς λειτουργούν ως ομάδα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
